de.esoco.gwt.client.data

Class DataElementListModel

    public class DataElementListModel
extends de.esoco.lib.model.ListDataModel<java.lang.Object>
    Implementation of an EWT data model based on a list of data elements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataElementListModel

        public DataElementListModel(de.esoco.ewt.UserInterfaceContext rContext,
                            de.esoco.data.element.DataElementList rModelElement,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> rElementNames,
                            java.lang.String sResourcePrefix,
                            boolean bListsOnly)
        Recursively creates a new instance from a list of root data elements. The boolean parameter allows to control which elements from the list will be added to this model. If TRUE, only the data element lists will be added to this model, omitting any detail information from the other data elements in the hierarchy. If FALSE, all data elements will be available from this model instance.

        The attributes parameter allows to add only certain attributes of the data elements to this model. The attributes list must contain valid attribute names for the given data elements.

        Parameters:
        rContext - The user interface context for resource lookups (may be NULL if no resource access is needed)
        rModelElement - The list of root elements to create this model from
        rElementNames - A list of the names of elements in the list to be included in this model or NULL for all
        sResourcePrefix - The prefix to be prepended to all model strings that are used for resource lookups
        bListsOnly - TRUE if only element lists shall be added to the model, but no other child elements; FALSE to include the full element hierarchy

    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        public final DataElementListModel getParent()
        Returns the parent data model of this instance. The parent will be NULL if this model is the root of a hierarchy or if this is only a single, flat data model.
        Returns:
        The parent data model or NULL for none
